snippet: The body of Sarai Sierra, 33, of Staten Island, was discovered near a major road along the ancient walls of a city she was visiting alone, a news agency said.
abstract: Body of missing Staten Island resident Sarai Sierra is found in Istanbul, Turkey; she had failed to return home from a Turkish vacation alone in January; police say she suffered fatal blow to her head.

byline.original: By SEBNEM ARSU and MARC SANTORA
byline.contributor: Sebnem Arsu reported from Istanbul, and Marc Santora from New York. Christopher Maag contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: The body of Sarai Sierra, 33, of Staten Island, was discovered near a major road along the ancient walls of a city she was visiting alone, a news agency said.

headline.seo: Vacationing Staten Island Woman Found Dead in Turkey
headline.main: Woman Found Dead After Vanishing on Vacation in Istanbul
headline.print_headline:
Missing New York Woman
Is Found Dead in Turkey
